quotes.Name: James Allen
quotes.Quote: Circumstance does not make the man; it reveals him to himself.

quotes.Name: Rick Sanchez
quotes.Quote: That's planning for failure, Morty...Even dumber than regular planning.

quotes.Name: John Pinette
quotes.Quote: The bills are late, but I got good toilet paper.

quotes.Name: Sterling Archer
quotes.Quote: Not that I don't appreciate the sacrifices made by the men and women in our armed forces, but there are better ways to almost qualify for food stamps.

quotes.Name: Gin Rummy from The Boondocks
quotes.Quote: The absence of evidence is not the evidence of absence.

quotes.Name: Susan Sontag
quotes.Quote: Time exists in order that everything doesn't happen all at once...and space exists so that it doesn't all happen to you.

quotes.Name: Ben Lerner
quotes.Quote: Nothing in the world is as old as what was futuristic in the past.

quotes.Name: Danny Chau
quotes.Quote: Unwritten rules are rules that no one bothered to write down because they're about feelings, a subject that no one wants to talk about.
